author: smorovic
body:
Main changes:
- Fix for a deadlock in source when error appears before first event
- any remaining input files from a closing lumisections are deleted in preBeginEndGlobalLumi by EvFDaqDirector (new mutex was needed to protect a list of files pending deletion)
- input discovers json files, not raw ones
- BU emulator file ordering fixes
- moved FastMonitoringService and EvFDaqDirector implementation to "src", so it could be used by DQM histogram output module. New path name functions were added as well for that purpose.
- renamed "Stream" output module to EvFOutputModule (per request for ConfDB compatibility), cfi files added for 

Please review for merging in the 7_1_X branch.
title: EvF updates
